translations.chinese: 四月，項梁擊殺景駒、秦嘉，止薛，沛公往見之。
translations.english: In the fourth month, Xiang Liang attacked and killed Jing Ju and Qin Jia, then stopped at Xue. Pei Gong went to see him.

translations.chinese: 項梁益沛公卒五千人，五大夫將十人。
translations.english: Xiang Liang increased Pei Gong's troops by five thousand men and ten generals of the rank of Grand Master.

translations.chinese: 沛公 還，引兵攻豐，拔之。
translations.english: Pei Gong returned and led troops to attack Feng, capturing it.
In the fifth month, Xiang Yu captured Xiangcheng and returned.
